CHAT.comment: the children are playing with "marble tracks" , a toy about 1 feet tall with slanting tracks which marbles roll down. the children put the marbles in at the top and watch them roll down to the base. there are three of them. KI and SC are playing with one of the marble tracks; TP is playing with another while MA watches him; CO is playing with the third one.

u.a: referring to marbles
TP rolls all his marbles down

they all continue to play nonverbally for a minute; then CO's mom comes to talk to MA; they talk for a while and then leave; TP , KI and SC watch them leave; TP waits a moment and then leaves , following the adults
gives SC a marble; SC attempts to put the marble into the track; KI stops him with her hand over the marble entrance
SC tries again; KI stops him with her hand over entrance again
still playing at other marble track; calls out to KI
KI doesn't respond; moves from her marble track to stand in front of KI
turns to him and gives him marbles; CO's mom comes back with MA , holding a basket; she kneels down to say goodbye to CO; KI watches them intently
she kisses CO goodbye

CO's mom leaves; CO is sitting on ground and KI immediately shows her some marbles; they look at them for a minute; KI gets some more from base of marble track and goes to another marble track , leaving SC; CO follows her
she points to one end; she then suddenly points to the other end
KI watches CO put marbles into the track for a while

SC leaves area , to go get MA; JO walks into the area , and heads over to KI . he is wearing a tie; they stand around a minute looking at each other; KI and JO are smiling; SC comes back , picks up marbles , and looks towards MA coming to the area
touches JO's tie
KI starts looking for her nametag , which is on her back; she runs to MA , who has just entered the area

KI goes back to CO and JO; TP comes backi nto area , followed by JS and LA; JS hugs MA (who is sitting on the ground) and LA goes to the marble track that no one is playing with; TP gets there at the same time
referring to track
referring to marbles
she gets up from ground; NI enters area and follows MA around
points to bottom of track and then to top
she leaves area; LA begins dropping marbles onto the marble track
referring to her marbles which land at the base on his side
MA comes back into area; NI goes over to SC
LA lets one marble go
SC and NI come over; they and JS are watching this intensely
said very angrily
LA gets up and looks at SC; they go over to other marble track; JS tries to put marbles into "TP's" marble track

JS and NI go over to SC and LA's marble track; during this episode , JO , CO , and KI are playing next to them; CO drops the marbles into the tracks , and JO and KI watch them roll down; before each time CO drops one , she asks "Can I do this one now ?"; this happens over and over
doesn't wait for answer
rolling marbles down

CHAT.comment: CO has run out of marbles and begins jumping/dancing around; KI , CO , and JO then play with marbles on the ground; JF comes in and talks to MA a bit while the children play with marbles; the activity goes on nonverbally for a few minutes; he finishes talking to her and leaves; TP watches him leave and then follows; a minute later MA leaves too. NI goes over to marble track which TP left and begins to play. There's a scream "NO!" from a girl in one of the other areas; MA intervenes there , and all of this has caught the attention of SC , JS , LA , and they then leave area; CO , JO , and KI continue to play. NI does all of his marbles at once , which is very loud , and this attracts KI's attention

u.a: she goes over to NI
takes/gives a marble and goes back to JO and CO

no verbal reply; cannot tell if there is a nonverbal one; CO waits for a minute and then begins to drop the marbles onto the track; When CO is done , she , JO , and KI get on floor and group the marbles; JO gets a hold of one puts it into the marble track

NI does all of his marbles at once again , which is very loud , and this attracts KI's attention again; she goes over to NI and begins picking up his marbles; JO and CO watch them; CO goes back to playing on the first marble track; after watching NI and KI play for a while , JO joins her; they play for a few minutes like this; JO switches over to KI and NI's marble track , leaving CO alone; after a minute , CO calls out to KI
no response from KI
the marble track is tipping over; KI tries to fix it; no response; CO touches KI's head

CO leaves; JO , KI , and NI play together for awhile; cannot hear very well , since they talk very quietly; JO and KI go over to the first marble track and do it together; they do all their marbles at once; after they all go through the track , JO looks at KI and then starts jumping up and down and laughing; KI starts jumping up and down too; as she jumps , she starts to turn around simultaneously; JO starts to copy her
she starts to do it
she starts jumping up and down
imitates her; KI runs a bit and jumps , JO follows her
pats the third marble track as he goes by; they both then return to the first marble track
shakes her finger at him as she says this
KI watches him leave , waits a moment
she leaves , following JO
KI runs to the first marble track , JO follows; JF now enters area and so does JE; JE starts to play on the third marble track; NI continues to play on the second one
she leaves; JO waits for her

u.freecode: to JE , who has placed a "snake" at the base of his marble track

u.a: no response; JE lets his marbles go
looks out to the yard

u.freecode: to JE , who has just made his snake attack JF's chest
u.a: JE shows the snake to JF , but doesn't give it to him; they talk about it very quietly (cannot make anything out); NI leaves the area
begins putting marbles on marble track; a commotion outside of the area grabs everyone's attention; TM and TM's mom have just arrived; they enter area
TM has brought a string to school from home
TM puts the string in his mouth
JO leaves; meanwhile , TM has put the string in his mouth again
TM and his mom go over the the second marble track; TM puts the string on top of a shelf; JE turns his attention to JF , who is playing on the third marble track still
touches JF's pockets
no verbal response , but JF pats his pockets; a moment goes by; JE is collecting marbles
points to other side of marble track

u.freecode: picks up marble and examines it
TM's mom has left , and he watches JF and JE for a minute; then he speaks to JF
u.a: TM turns back to his marble track; JE picks it up , examines it , and speaks to JF
takes marble from JE
examines it
points to closet in corner
opens closet door and looks in
begins moving containers , etc .
break in the tape for a minute; JE and JF are now back at the marble track; TM is still playing by himself on another marble track
hands JF some marbles
commotion in other part of room , JF looks , then resumes counting to himself; then gets louder

u.freecode: puts his hand to his head and leans back

u.a: grabs two marbles and drops; them onto the marble track; JE imitates
they roll marbles down for a bit
they roll marbles silently for a while

u.freecode: starts collecting the marbles at the base

u.a: unjams the marbles; JE collects the marbles and goes to the other side of the marble track
collects some marbles
points to TM
JF turns around and faces TM

u.freecode: picks one up and shows it to JF

u.a: goes back to collecting marbles
pulls sleeve back
goes over and helps
TM rolls all his marbles now and then wanders around a bit aimlessly; he then finds his string and plays with it a bit

u.freecode: leans on marble track , gets up

u.a: JE shakes the marble track , looking for marbles
from across the school; SI comes running in
JE doesn't look up or make eye contact; continues to examine marble track

gets down on floor with JE and starts picking up marbles; they both start rolling marbles down the track; SI laughs; NI enters area; TM starts playing on his marble track again; JE gets excited and "falls" down; marbles go in every direction

NI starts helping JF and SI and JE pick up marbles; TP enters area and starts picking up marbles too; they roll them down the marble track and quickly grab for more on the floor; they get very excited and noisy
SI rolls marbles and screams

JF hands some marbles to NI , who then goes to the first marble track no one is using; TP leaves area; JF tries to hand marbles to JE; but JE "falls" to the ground again , bumping JF's hand and making him drop a few marbles

u.freecode: hands them to JE , who then puts them in the third marble track that SI is using
u.a: JF gives some more marbles to NI; ER comes into the area
pointing; ER looks down at his sweatshirt
no response; ER watches them play for a minute; NI leaves the area; marbles begin to roll all over floor
begins picking some up; ER goes after a marble that rolls across the room and brings it back; JE starts going around room and getting marbles; he then leaves area
goes back to rolling marbles on his track , then turns around again
gives some marbles to ER
shows ER where; SI leaves area; AM enters
AM begins putting marbles in third track which SI had been playing with; TM picks up his string from the floor
begins swinging it around; ER continues playing with marbles; no observable response is made; NI comes into the area with a book and walks directly to JF , holding it out
takes book and leafs through it
takes book back and walks out of area; JF looks over at ER and TM
holds out four fingers; TM gives ER marbles to hold; AM looks for marbles , tries to pry JF's hands open
picks up some other marbles and puts them in the marble track; AM imitates
SA enters area and goes over to ER and TM; TM is picking up marbles
starts playing
TM looks up; SA looks at ER; JF looks over
JF gets up and goes over to the first marble track

SA starts playing with it; everybody plays for a while; NI comes back inand gives JF a book , and then walks away; JF puts the book on a shelf; SA wanders away from marble track and eventually goes up to camera and RI
SA wanders away; TM and ER are still playing marbles; ER looks down and notices that TM's marbles roll down into his side's base
ER starts dancing; TM imitates for a second then goes to get more marbles from the first marble track
ER comes over and gets more marbles
SA goes to the first marble track (the one he was playing with earlier) and watches them take marbles
gives SA some marbles; AM sees this and goes over to JF , trying to grab some marbles
points to base of marble track; AM goes to the base and collects some more; she turns to JF
everyone plays for a while
points to where string is on the ground; TM turns around , grabs a marble , then gives some to ER
ER accepts them and rolls them down the marble track
ER starts to sing and dance; dances away from marble track
ER dances out of area , no response to JF; NI enters area; SA enters area and has some paints
touches JF's shoulder
NI leaves area; a teacher comes in and takes the paints and SA back to the table
AM nods and and smiles; TM leaves area , and AM goes immediately over to the marble track he was playing with
TP comes in and bumps playfully against JF's back with his own back
he leaves area
tries to pat AM's pocket but she pulls away
she tries to take marbles from JF's hand
AM goes over to a marble track and gets some more marbles; NI wanders in
touches AM to get her attention; she is still collecting marbles
AM laughs and then begins collecting marbles again
no response
AM is tipping over the marble track in order to get more marbles underneath
NI leaves area; TP , TM and SA wander in and out
she continues to pick up marbles
AM starts crying
TP and SA watch this intently
JF looks over to him
holds out hand
points to marble track
QU has entered and watches this; TP leaves area now; SA goes over to the third marble track and then leaves area; JF is picking up marbles from AM's marble track
handing QU some marbles
he takes them , smiling; some marbles drop during the transfer; QU picks them up; AM gets up from sitting
CA has wandered into the area and now comes up to JF
JF hands marbles to CA; she goes to play on first marble track; AM holds her hand out and makes pleading vocalizations
after a moment , AM stoops down to pick up more marbles
after a moment , AM tries to pick up marbles from track base on the marble track QU is playing with
he takes her hand and brings her to the third marble track

another moment passes , then she starts playing on the marble track , rolling marbles down; JF is called out of the area by another child at the activity tables; AM leaves area; CA leaves the first marble track for a second; as soon as she leaves , QU goes immediately to the track and starts collecting marbles , then rolls them down; CA comes back and starts pulling the track away from QU
he pulls back; the track falls over
goes over and picks track up again
pointing to QU
touches the marble track QU was originally playing on; QU goes over and begins to play; JF turns around and gives CA a marble , but it dropsand rolls across the floor
smiling , looking at JF
JF leaves area for a minute to get more marbles; CA wanders around area for a while
JF hands him some; he begins to roll them down the track; after he's done , QU looks over to JF

g.ga: goes through actions as he talks

u.a: QU gets down on floor and starts collecting marbles; several minutes go by; QU leaves area , CA plays with construction toys by herself; JF leaves area; a break in the taping; when it comes back on , EL , ER , and CA are playing in area
EL starts rolling marbles
she then gets closer to the marble track
he's at another marble track he rolls a marble
CA goes over to the third track
she lets a marble roll down track

u.freecode: to JF , who is out of the area

u.a: this is just a chant by now; no clear addressee
he does marbles; meanwhile ER comes over to CA's marble track; CA does a little dance , they both laugh; ER then shakes the marble track , they both laugh; ER then points upward
voice is "deeper"
pointing; CA laughs
CA starts throwing marbles up into the air; ER chases them and then starts throwing them up in the air too
rolls marbles; a bunch of children enter area at once; very noisy
he does it one more time , and then leaves area; CA and ER play a while , imitating each other's actions and movements (dancing) nonverbally , and then they leave area
